name: Program-Ace
tag_list: 3d, 3d-simulation, virtual-training, virtual-trainings, memorization, skill-training, personal-health, personal-safety, healthcare, emergency-evacuation, 3d-solution, industry-visualization, simulation, virtual-reality, software-development, programming,
overview:
Program-Ace is the R&D and innovation-oriented software development company in Eastern Europe specialized on delivering interactive 3D solutions and complex web-based systems for the needs of wide range of industries: from civil defense to entertainment.

Program-Ace is a software development company that develops and markets Virtual 3D trainings as a tool that implements all the stages of training (introduction, memorization, skill training and testing).

It can be applied in such training application fields like:

  • personal health & safety
  • elimination of emergency conditions and evacuation
  • maintenance of the technological process and equipment
